entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , The Pas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:18 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -30.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: The Pas Airport 04:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -30.8°C
Pressure: 103.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -35.6°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
